title.value: Экономические показатели производства молока и характеристика воспроизводительных качеств дочерей быков-производителей, носителей синдрома иммунодефицита крупного рогатого скота (BLAD), и их сверстниц

Economic parameters of milk manufacture and the characteristic of reproductive qualities of daughters of bulls-manufacturers carriers of immunodeficiency syndrome of cattle (BLAD) and their herd mates

Economic parameters of milk manufacture and the characteristic of reproductive qualities of daughters of bulls-manufacturers carriers of immunodeficiency syndrome of cattle (BLAD) and their herd mates

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Trakhimchik, R.V., Grodno State Agrarian Univ. (Belarus)

abstract.value: Researches directed on studying of dairy efficiency of daughters of manufacturing bulls - carriers of a syndrome of a hereditary immunodeficiency of cattle are carried out on faculty of genetics and cultivation of agricultural animals OE 'Grodno state agrarian university', in laboratory of industrial biotechnology ОE 'Polesye State University', in the agricultural organizations of the Grodno area, and also in Grodno regional dairy laboratory in RUSP 'Grodno breeding enterprise' in 2010 - 2012. Object of research were daughters of bulls-manufacturers - carriers of immunodeficiency syndrome (Drozd 400092, Malakhit 400103 and Stukach 400120), and also their contemporaries maintenance on dairy-commodity complexes and the agricultural organizations in the Grodno and Voronovsk districts. The revealed regularity of decrease at daughters of bulls - mutation carriers in CD18 gene in comparison with contemporaries of a yield of milk on (from 7.9% to 18,1% P0,001), amounts of dairy fat and milk protein (from 9,6% to 20.9% and from 9,8% to 21,4% of P0,001) testifies to expediency of creation of herds resistant to a syndrome of an immunodeficiency of cattle.
